title: Reduce nondeterminism in test_jit
body_html:
Occasionally Travis builds would fail on these two tests.
In the first case, it seems that Python will sometimes decide
to associate the multiplies differently; on the second case,
it's due to nondeterminism in multithreading. Try to make
this more deterministic.

Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang ezyang@fb.com

body:
Occasionally Travis builds would fail on these two tests.
In the first case, it seems that Python will sometimes decide
to associate the multiplies differently; on the second case,
it's due to nondeterminism in multithreading.  Try to make
this more deterministic.

Signed-off-by: Edward Z. Yang <ezyang@fb.com>
